lead_paragraph: BOSTON, Aug. 18 (AP) — David Ortiz’s grand slam capped a six-run fifth inning, Curt Schilling earned his first victory since a one-hitter two months ago and the Boston Red Sox defeated the Anaheim Angels, 10-5, on Saturday night in a matchup of the teams with the best records in the majors.
